REM CONFIG CRC IS C3D5
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
SLEEP,00,200
REM RESET THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000a5a5
SLEEP,00,200
REM HARDWARE CONFIGURATION
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,04000201002420120E138801F404000606FF080203052600000500000000000000200606530000000009
SLEEP,00,200
REM Writing CustomA RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,
REM Writing CustomB RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040010010154C059061C00040242040402420303146D3D3D3D3D3D3D3D2C2C2C0000000000000000FCFC000000000000000000000000404040E04040404040404091949444959595450000000000000000000000000000000000
REM Set DPC table
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000301004AD7051B065F06A306E30627076B07AF07EF072B083F083E083E083F083B083F0837098309CF09190ADF04A702EB022F037303B703FB033F048304C7040B054F05320032003200FFFFFF0F
SLEEP,00,200
REM UICC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000A01001A40003C3C04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM SE CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000B01001A40041E1E04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM IOT CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000801000C9F00BF000000C1C2C2003D00
SLEEP,00,200
REM ANTENNA CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400090100200000E10BB801B5FFEC0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM NFCC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400010100052051000606
SLEEP,00,200
REM WRITE CONFIGURATION CRC IN THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000C3D5
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM MATCHING ;78.4;2.7;57.6;Differential;Yes;15;560;No;No;ANT;1500;4.7;77;100;DNP;77;DNP;150
REM CONFIGURATION ;1231.5;657.273287680036;6.26992225117076;No;No;Differential;Yes;77;560;162;194;DNP;DNP;ANT;94;27;4.7;100;4.5
REM TOOL VERSION 3.01
